item.title: Three categories of teamwork
item.description:
I recently wrote the post “The Three Buckets model” for my own time. It reminded me of a similar model for how teams could spend their time.

Back in the day I had a product owner (PO) for a former team who used to start off our sprint planning sessions with

Here are the key product asks I think we should deliver this sprint. What team initiatives are you interested in driving?
